All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
addHotelGUI
visual interface for the addHotel functionalities
addRoomGUI
visual interface for the addRoom functionalities of the program
Controller
class that is responsible for listening to the actions performed by the user in the GUI and doing some other action that corresponds to it
createReservationGUI
class responsible for the visual interface of the individual reservation creation functionalities
dateListListener
class responsible to listening to the date list dropdown meny in the individual view hotel meny
Deluxe
Represents a Deluxe room, which is 20% more expensive than a standard room
DiscountCodes
Contains all the valid discount codes, all set to public static final
Driver
Houses the main method.
Executive
Represents a Executive room, which is 35% more expensive than a standard room
Hotel
Responsible for representing a single hotel.
HotelManager
Responsible for containing all the hotels and the following four main features of the program: Create Hotel View Hotel Manage Hotel Simulate Booking
indivHotelInfoGUI
class that is responsible for the visual interface of the view individual hotel info functionalities
indivHotelManagerGUI
class responsible for displaying the graphical interface that allows the user to select how they want to modify a hotel
mainMenuGUI
class that is responsible for implementing a visual interface for the main menu
manageHotelGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface of the manage hotel meny
priceModifierGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface for mofify price per date functionalities
removeReservationGUI
class responsible for implementing a visual interface for the remove reservation functionalities
removeRoomGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface for remove room functionalities
renameHotelGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface for rename hotel functionalities
Reservation
Responsible for handling all the data needed for a customer to reserve a hotel room
reservationGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface for reservation information
reservePickerGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface of choosing a hotel to reserve to
Room
Responsible for handling all the data corresponding to a hotel room
roomGUI
class responsible for implementing visual interface for room information
updatePricingGUI
is the class that is responsible for implementing visual interface for the update price functionalities
viewHotelGUI
class responsible for implementing a visual interface for the first view hotel page
